1.0.name: wordpress/wpsmart-sms
1.0.description:
You may enter any mobile number through the Send SMS tab.

No need for configuration of your WP Smart sms settings.Enter your username, password,message and Mobile number through the Settings tab.
sms are leading providers of mobile messaging, platform design & development and integration solutions with extensive mobile network partnerships around the world. Smartsms offers highly competitive pricing for bulk SMS pricing for bulk SMS. Sign Up for an SMART Sms account today.

Feature

  • Easy to send sms to mobile.
  • No need to extra configaration for sending SMS.
  • Have Shortcode system is [sms].
  • Professional Design
